knight: We are the knights who say Ni!
castle: I fart in your general direction!
Your mother was a hamster, and your father smelt of elderberries!
We no like you English pig-dogs!
I don't want to talk to you no more, you empty-headed animal food trough wiper.
I burst my pimples at you and call your door-opening request a silly thing, you tiny-brained wipers of other people's bottoms!
Now go away, or I shall taunt you a second time!
spam: SPAM, SPAM, SPAM, SPAM, SPAM, SPAM, SPAM, SPAM, SPAM!
No one expects the Spam Inquisition!
peasant: He hasn't got shit all over him.
Well, I didn't vote for you.

Listen, strange women lying in ponds distributing swords is no basis for a system of government. Supreme executive power derives from a mandate from the masses, not from some farcical aquatic ceremony.
dead: Good evening. Tonight on 'Is There?' we examine the question, 'Is there a life after death?'. And here to discuss it are three dead people.
witch: She turned me into a newt.
ni: We are the knights who say Ni!
beast: But if he was dying, he wouldn't bother to carve 'Aargh'.
romans: All right, but apart from the sanitation, medicine, education, wine, public order, irrigation, roads, the fresh water system and public health, what have the Romans ever done for us?
messiah: He's not the Messiah. He's a very naughty boy!
